articles.title: Miracle new weight loss jab may make you BALD - Daily Mail
articles.description: Balding and so-called 'sulphur burps' are just some of the worrying side effects reported by Mounjaro users amid reports of massive weight-loss results from the weekly jab.
articles.content:
The new miracle weight loss jab taking social media by storm may also be causing baldness and 'sulphur burps'.
Mounjaro users have reported a string of unexpected and nasty side effects, similar to … [+8717 chars]

articles.title: Huge cache of mammal genomes offers fresh insights on human evolution - Nature.com

articles.content:
